external_games.name: Down the Eye of the Tiger

name: Down the Eye of the Tiger
summary: A burnt out Las Vegas cocktail waitress has grown to resent her life, her city, and her choices. In the wake of an incident at her job, she decides to dedicate some more time to "self care" (sleeping, adopting avoidant behaviors, ditching work), and finds her dreams blending with those of the magician's white tiger at the casino where she works.
